participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Disciplined and compassionate, with a strong sense of duty.
participant_1.background: i'm ex military. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and energetic, always looking for the next thrill.
participant_2.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. i'm a skateboarder. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you? I volunteer at a local shelter, so I donate to charities for them
I can speak a little german and french as well as english of course.
